casebody.data:
PIRO
v.
McKEEVER, et al. No. 93A16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 20, 2016. Andrew J. Epstein, for McKeever, Rebecca Hadden. Michelle D. Connell, Raleigh, for Piro, Michael C. Tobias S. Hampson, Raleigh, for Piro, Michael C. Mark E. Anderson, for National Association of Social Workers. Monica E. Webb, Raleigh, for National Association of Social Workers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of May 2016 by National Association of Social Workers for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of May 2016."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
